name: Two Children
description:
Adopted from Thạch Lam's "Hai đứa trẻ" (Two Children).

===================================

Two siblings, one route, many fates.

Enter Lien, a young Hanoi girl who has witnessed both heaven and hell. After her father losing the breadline, she and her little brother An returned to the countryside to make ends meet selling groceries. This is a story of the people who dream of a life of stability, and those who have lost it.

==================================

This game is in development and subject to changes; check back frequently!

All rights belong to their respective owners.
